name: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them VR Experience
name_original: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them VR Experience
description: Ready to see the Wizarding World as you've never experienced it before? Then step through Newt Scamander's case and explore the spectacular world of Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them in a breathtaking cinematic virtual reality experience. Meet and interact with 6 beasts, complete spells, and immerse yourself in the magic like never before.
